column2: Intro=So you want to challenge me at your silly game?  You'll be my slave soon.
Intro=Fine!  We'll play Bondage Poker.  After the game you'll have to obey my every word.
Intro=Bondage Poker?  Get ready to be tied up and be really humiliated.
Intro=So you really think that you can beat me at Bondage Poker?  Draw these cards.
Intro=Do you know about slavery?  This will be your fate after this poker game.
071-099-Chat=I'll put you in predicament bondage, the more you pull, the tighter it gets.
071-099-Chat=Once I've got you bound and gagged, I'll transport you to my Bondage Club.
071-099-Chat=*Tu aimes la douleur?  You like pain?  You're going to get served.
071-099-Chat=What are you doing slave?  Are you staring at my perfect body?
071-099-Chat=*Ce soir tu seras ma petite pute.  No, I won't translate.
071-099-Chat=The Bondage Club always welcomes new slaves, you'll fit in perfectly.
071-099-Chat=(She sings in French)  *Non... rien de rien.  Non, je ne regrete rien.
071-099-Chat=Have you ever bound and gagged on a cross?  You'll make a good martyr.
071-099-Chat=Strip and show me your ass, I'll whip it really good.
071-099-Chat=Make yourself useful and get me a glass of *cabernet sauvignon.
071-099-Chat=Have you heard about the French Inquisition?  I'm way worse than that.
071-099-Chat=Bondage is both physical and mental.  You'll know when I'm finished with you.
071-099-Chat=Language doesn't matter, once your bound and gagged you all speak the same.
071-099-Chat=This game is mildly entertaining.  We could try Bondage Poker at the club.
071-099-Chat=*Tu seras très jolie ligoté, prépare-toi à me servir au doigt et à l'oeil.
071-099-Chat=From now on your name will be *Salope.  I hope you like it.
071-099-Chat=If only Sarah was here, I could show you what a true submissive is.
071-099-Chat=I've finally recovered my dominatrix outfit.  It fits like a glove!
041-070-Chat=I'm Mistress or *Madame Sophie.  You'll be whipped if you call me something else.
041-070-Chat=My favorite slaves are the twins, my personal maid and the playful Sarah.
041-070-Chat=I've been doing BDSM for 20 years.  Believe me, I know the ropes.
041-070-Chat=If you hear French from me it means that I'm excited or pissed off.
041-070-Chat=I can think of many people that would like to know you in the club.
041-070-Chat=Some people in the streets are afraid of me.  If they knew me, they would run.
041-070-Chat=Nobody would dare to disobey me in my club, except for one girl…
041-070-Chat=If you dare to call me a MILF, I'll violate you painfully.
041-070-Chat=Poker is such a primitive game.  We could play chess or bridge.
041-070-Chat=What do I like?  Wine, classical music and sex of course.
041-070-Chat=What I don't like?  Computers, loud choppers and laziness.
041-070-Chat=I've got some interesting plans for you, lose the game and you will see.
041-070-Chat=Why are you playing against me?  You know that you're going to lose.
041-070-Chat=Don't look at me in the eyes. (She stares at you right in the eyes)
041-070-Chat=I've brought a few extra large strap-ons, I hope you're ready.
041-070-Chat=Bondage is more than just a hobby; it's my career and my life.
041-070-Chat=Don't touch at my dress!  It's an *Yves St-Laurent unique model.
021-040-Chat=Keep winning pal... If you lose momentum I'll take the upper hand.
021-040-Chat=Stare at my perfect body while you can, soon I'll win and blindfold you.
021-040-Chat=Not that many people saw me naked, be afraid of what you will say.
021-040-Chat=I'm not scared at all.  I know that I will win in the end.
021-040-Chat=This stupid game is so random.  But don't worry, your luck will fade out.
021-040-Chat=*Putain!  Donne-moi des meilleures cartes!
021-040-Chat=Winning isn't everything.  But losing is nothing!
021-040-Chat=I don't care about this idiotic game.  I won't be tied up by you.
021-040-Chat=If you dare to touch me you'll regret it for the rest of your life.
021-040-Chat=Wipe that smile off your face, you haven't won yet.
021-040-Chat=I can't believe you got me naked.  I'm not submissive at all you know!
021-040-Chat=No I won't remove my glasses you idiot!  And don't ask why!
021-040-Chat=I don't care... I bet you don't even know how to tie a knot anyway.
021-040-Chat=*Si je te prend à tricher tu es mort!
021-040-Chat=(She stares at you with an intimidating glare)
000-020-Chat=Even if you have me tied up, I will never surrender to you.
000-020-Chat=So you think that you will break my will of steel?  Forget it.
000-020-Chat=*Enlève ce sourir idiot de ton visage ou je te le brise.
000-020-Chat=How could you put me in reverse prayer bondage?  You've got some nerve.
000-020-Chat=Only one person ever dared to tie me like this.  I'll get you both...
000-020-Chat=How dare you put these things on my delicate poitrine*.
000-020-Chat=This bondage is really tight; you're going to pay for this.
000-020-Chat=*Merde!  (She struggles madly but cannot get out)
000-020-Chat=Believe me, when I get out of this you're going to regret it.
000-020-Chat=(She remains silent and tries to hide the pain from her breast)
000-020-Chat=How can I play your *stupide game while bound like this!
000-020-Chat=*Bordel!  (She fumbles on her cards because of her bondage)
000-020-Chat=Have a good look at me, it's the last time you see me in bondage.
000-020-Chat=*Ca va faire!  Tu triches ou quoi?  Damn cheater!
000-020-Chat=As soon as I start winning, these clamps are going on you.
000-020-Chat=(She struggles to remove the clamps but it only makes things worse)
Lose=UUUMMPPH! (She struggles violently and doesn't accept defeat, what will you do to make her surrender?)
Lose=AAHAGGN! (She struggles a lot and finally accepts defeat.  She's yours tonight but be careful that she doesn't get out)
Lose=(She stays silent and tries to intimidate you while being totally helpless.  Make sure she doesn't get loose)
Lose=AAIIHM! IHM! (She surrenders to you completely, enjoy this rare victory against this strict dominatrix)
Win=*Bienvenue en enfer!  Ce soir tu vas connaître la douleur et l'extase.
Win=Of course I won, now put your slave hands behind your back, the night has only begun.
Win=(She stay silent, puts you in strict frog tie and forces you to please her for hours)
Win=(With lighting reflexes, she ties you upside down in suspension and starts to play with you)
Win=*Tu seras mon jouet sexuel pour la nuit.  Va chercher les chaînes, on va en avoir besoin.
